column4: How can I get win+d kind of shortcuts working in ubuntu? I have mapped win key to meta. changed config in keyboard shorcuts, but it is not working :(
docgnome: copy ur home direcotry there. everything will be fine
docgnome: configs are stored in hidden dires .gtk*  .gnome ...
what's wrong with ctrl + alt + D?
there should be something under /apps/metacity/global_keybindings/
in gconf
you should just be able to use <Super>d, I think
I got it working. open gconf, goto /apps/metacity/global_keybindings/show_desktop, change <Control><Alt>d to <Super>d
which ap?
/apps/gnome_settings_daemon/keybindings/music
and the rest are in the same directory in gconf
changed pause to <Super>c in /apps/gnome_settings_daemon/keybindings/music. It took c and my c key is not working on my laptop now.
your c key isn't working?
hmm... I wonder why? What does it say is the gconf entry?
In gconf entry it is <Super>c , but when I see it in keyboard-shortcuts gui, it shows as c. this happened to me many time. I wonder why.
I trying to find what the hex of the key combo would be, I am just having a google of it so it might take a while
what I understand from this is that it is working in metacity keybindings,but not in gnome-settings-daemon.
from what I understand, gnome-settings... will only accept single key shortcuts for most of the keys
and because when <Super>C was used it only read the last character, it tried to use c as the shortcut
What I got in conclusion is that music shortcuts  are not working for me in total.What ever key I give for that will stop working. (Tried <ctrl><alt>b, b stopped working)
from what I understand, gnome-settings... will only accept single key shortcuts for most of the keys
and because when <Super>C was used it only read the last character, it tried to use c as the shortcut
I think, there is probably some workaround
